duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with planning laboratory experiments and/or projects in support of an organization's mission.
Make credit card purchases concerning chemicals, gases, general lab supplies, lab maintenance and repair contracts.
Conduct routine equipment maintenance and repairs; and/or coordinate external equipment repairs.
Submit, monitor, and oversee ARMA requests for lab maintenance and repairs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Physical Science or related field (Master's preferred)
